about_the_game:
This DLC adds more plates and a new game type, the MoreFruits game, as well as an overflow mode.

This adds more plates and optional score bonuses depending on plate size.

It can be difficult to fit a lot of fruit onto a small plate. If you serve it on a small plate, additional points will be added to your score.
If you want to chase the highest score, you'll need this DLC.

Note: For standard games, these plates can be selected after creating a watermelon with a standard plate and each plate size.
Plates will be available in stages. On the other hand, in the More Fruits game, all these plates are available from the beginning.


Additionally, this DLC adds the MoreFruits game. You have to put a lot of fruit on the plate.

NOTICE: More fruits game does not add new any kind of fruits.


The rules are almost the same as the regular game, but there are many different kinds of randomly generated fruits.
However, getting a high score is not so easy.

Note: MoreFruits DLC does not add new fruits.

At last, let me introduce the overflow mode. In this mode, fruit can be served forever. Even if the fruit spills from the plate, the game will not be over.
However, points will be deducted.

Enjoy your watermelon platter with this More Plate, MoreFruits Game, and Overflow Mode.
detailed_description:
This DLC adds more plates and a new game type, the MoreFruits game, as well as an overflow mode.

This adds more plates and optional score bonuses depending on plate size.

It can be difficult to fit a lot of fruit onto a small plate. If you serve it on a small plate, additional points will be added to your score.
If you want to chase the highest score, you'll need this DLC.

Note: For standard games, these plates can be selected after creating a watermelon with a standard plate and each plate size.
Plates will be available in stages. On the other hand, in the More Fruits game, all these plates are available from the beginning.


Additionally, this DLC adds the MoreFruits game. You have to put a lot of fruit on the plate.

NOTICE: More fruits game does not add new any kind of fruits.


The rules are almost the same as the regular game, but there are many different kinds of randomly generated fruits.
However, getting a high score is not so easy.

Note: MoreFruits DLC does not add new fruits.

At last, let me introduce the overflow mode. In this mode, fruit can be served forever. Even if the fruit spills from the plate, the game will not be over.
However, points will be deducted.

Enjoy your watermelon platter with this More Plate, MoreFruits Game, and Overflow Mode.
name: SUIKA DISH More Plates

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 and later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 and later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 SUPER
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: More plates, more points. More fruits, more points.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Indonesian, Dutch, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Korean, Ukrainian, Greek, Swedish, Spanish - Latin America, Czech, Danish, Hungarian, Finnish, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Romanian, Traditional Chinese, Norwegian, Icelandic, Urdu, Georgian, Slovak, Swahili, Basque, Hindi, Filipino, Bangla, Persian, Malay, Mongolian, Luxembourgish
